TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDispatchMessageFormatter

summary.span: 定义服务应用程序中用于反序列化请求消息和序列化响应消息的方法。

span.span: Defines methods that deserialize request messages and serialize response messages in a service application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 接口，以创建可对服务应用程序中从参数到消息的序列化和从消息到参数的反序列化进行控制的格式化程序扩展。Implement the interface to create a formatter extension that controls the serialization of parameters into a message and the deserialization from a message into parameters in a service application. 若要向服务应用程序中插入自定义格式化程序，则请使用行为，将 属性分配给 对象。To insert the custom formatter into the service application, assign the object to the property using a behavior. ## Examples 有关完整示例，请参阅[操作格式化程序和操作选择器](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeserializeRequest (System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DeserializeRequest(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message message, object[] parameters) cil managed
Public Sub DeserializeRequest (message As Message, parameters As Object())
abstract member DeserializeRequest : System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message * obj[] -> unit

param.name: parameters
param.span: 作为参数传递到操作的对象。

span.span: The objects that are passed to the operation as parameters.

summary.span: 将消息反序列化为参数数组。

span.span: Deserializes a message into an array of parameters.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关完整示例，请参阅[操作格式化程序和操作选择器](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector).

summary.span: 从指定的消息版本、参数数组和返回值序列化答复消息。

span.span: Serializes a reply message from a specified message version, array of parameters, and a return value.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关完整示例，请参阅[操作格式化程序和操作选择器](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector)。For a complete example, see [Operation Formatter and Operation Selector](/dotnet/framework/wcf/samples/operation-formatter-and-operation-selector).
